results.title: Metformin effect on gut microbiota: insights for HIV-related inflammation
results.text_hl: Inspired by the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Dysbiosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064806 @@@gut dysbiosis@@@, we herein critically review the relevance of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to control @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ in PLWH.

results.title: Perilla Seed Oil Alleviates Gut Dysbiosis, Intestinal Inflammation and Metabolic Disturbance in Obese-Insulin-Resistant Rats
results.text_hl: Although 100 and 500 mg/kg/day of @CHEMICAL_perilla_seed_oil @CHEMICAL_MESH:C058216 @@@PSO@@@ attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Dysbiosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064806 @@@gut dysbiosis@@@, particularly the percentage of Enterobacteriaceae, in HFD-fed @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ in a dose-independent manner, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ had the highest efficacy in alleviating @<m>DISEASE_Dysbiosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064806 @@@gut dysbiosis@@@.

results.title: The Emerging Role of Metformin in the Prevention and Treatment of Colorectal Cancer: A Game Changer for the Management of Colorectal Cancer.
results.text_hl: Potential mechanisms by which @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may decrease @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colorectal cancer@@@ risk include its effects on ameliorating @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@intestinal inflammation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Dysbiosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064806 @@@dysbiosis@@@, suppressing major proliferative pathways, preventing DNA replication, accelerating @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ cells apoptosis, inhibiting intra-@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ angiogenesis and epithelial-mesenchymal transition (EMT), increasing @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@-infiltrating lymphocytes and @GENE_CD68 @GENE_968 @@@CD68@@@+ @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@-associated macrophages, and enhancing T cells cytotoxic activity.

results.title: Gut microbiota dysbiosis in stable coronary artery disease combined with type 2 diabetes mellitus influences cardiovascular prognosis.
results.text_hl: Our study also addressed how @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may confound @<m>DISEASE_Dysbiosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064806 @@@gut dysbiosis@@@ and increase the potential for nitrogen metabolism.

results.title: Separating "good" from "bad" faecal dysbiosis - evidence from two cross-sectional studies
results.text_hl: The @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Dysbiosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D064806 @@@dysbiosis@@@ is, therefore, "good" for the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
